title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2 and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and CLI for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and admin controls.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat, similar to GitHub Copilot but local.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and embed with idiomatic Java APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; ingest PDFs and query with local LLMs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to build and run Ollama on NixOS with GPU (CUDA/ROCm) support declaratively.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model caching.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await, streaming, and dependency-injection helpers for ASP.NET Core.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing code against local LLMs in pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with comptime JSON parsing and cross-compilation to embedded targets.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP library wrapping Ollama with GenServer pools and LiveView chat examples.

title: ollama-rustico
summary: Lightweight Rust CLI for Ollama with clipboard integration and shell piping utilities.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that plugs Ollama models into channels/DMs with event streaming and role-based access.
